messages.message: Hi Shubham - i am still using build-machine-v17-09-26 (https://console.cloud.google.com/compute/instancesDetail/zones/us-central1-b/instances/build-machine-v17-09-26?project=instabase-build), and willneed to get off it. qq, can we add shared storage mounts across buil;d machines so that we can replace build machines independently ? :slightly_smiling_face:

Hey @sudeep will chat with you on this.

Itâ€™s possible and would like to learn more about your use-case.
